translation: Dhāraṇī of the Unsurpassed Great Luminosity

source_sentence: 西天譯經三藏朝散大夫
translation: Tripiṭaka of the Western Paradise Translation Sutra, Chaosan Dashi

source_sentence: 試鴻臚少卿傳教大師臣
translation: Minister of the Great Teaching of the Young Minister of Hongluo
Fetian Fengzhao Translation

source_sentence: 歸命禮正覺　　及法賢聖僧
translation: taking refuge in the True Enlightenment and the noble monks of the Dharma

source_sentence: 菩薩說此明　　所說破障礙
translation: The bodhisattva explains this clarification, which explains the breakdown of obstacles

source_sentence: 吠多拏羯吒布多曩一切根本呪法。
translation: "Vetāṇakarmaṭṭhaputta-nāma are all fundamental dhāraṇīs.

source_sentence: 藥叉及羅剎娑眾所作邪法。
translation: They are the wrong dharmas of the Yakṣas and Rājagṛha.
This bright dhāraṇī destroys them and always causes them to practice correctly.

source_sentence: 若有情懇虔誠一心受持此明呪者。
translation: If sentient beings sincerely and single-mindedly accept and uphold this incantation, then they can write it on silk or on paper.
Either write it on silk or on birch paper.
Or write it down on birch-skin paper or the like.

source_sentence: 彼一切處諸惡鬼魅生決定慈。
translation: Those evil spirits and demons in all places will give rise to resolute kindness.
It will remove calamities and hindrances and accomplish the most excellent deeds.
If he puts it on his neck and enters an army battlefield, he'll be able to defend it.
When people kill each other, they'll be able to defend them.
Their minds are free of delusion and fear, and not a hair is harmed.

source_sentence: 若戴手臂之上速得勝利。
translation: If he puts it on his arm, he'll quickly attain victory.
As the Buddha said.

source_sentence: 若有男子女人受持此明。
translation: "If a man or woman accepts and maintains this light.
All the things they desire will be accomplished.
Suppose the king's laws forbid binding them.

source_sentence: 若行曠野遇師子虎狼之難。
translation: If he travels in the wilderness and encounters the difficulties of lions, tigers, and wolves.
Suppose he travels on a road and encounters thieves and pirates following him.
This great luminosity has the power to rescue them.
It frees him from fears and gives him well-being.
If a woman puts her head on it and accepts it, she'll always have followers who love and respect him.

source_sentence: 常得眷屬心生愛敬恒獲財寶。
translation: She'll always have an inner circle of people who love and respect her, and she'll always have access to wealth and treasure.

source_sentence: 若復懷胎產難速得平安。
translation: If she were to again conceive a child and give birth to a baby, she'd quickly attain safety.
That's a great bright spell spoken by a bodhisattva.
It's the same when it's upheld day and night.
Suppose there's a wise person who whole-heartedly accepts and upholds it.
If he walks, stands, sits, or lies down, then demons and other difficult things won't harm him.
Demons and ghosts won't harm him.

source_sentence: 乃至酒醉睡眠亦無惡夢。
translation: Even when he's drunk, he'll fall asleep and have no bad dreams.
There's nothing they can do to overcome that knowledge.
If he retains it and recites it, then...

source_sentence: 所有國王聚落眾人鬪諍。
translation: All the king's villages and people's quarrels will disappear.
All hindrances and difficulties will all disappear.

source_sentence: 爾時無能勝菩薩告諸魔言。
translation: At that point, the invincible bodhisattva addressed the Māras and said.
"Now, I'll explain it.
Listen to what I've told you, you lot!
The bodhisattva saw that army of evil demons.
They were standing in front of him in various forms.
He said this for that army of Māra.
"For the sake of seeking enlightenment over the kalpas, I've sacrificed my life, my wife, and my possessions.
I've given up my life, my wife, and my wealth.
It's difficult to do, and I'm able to do it with great effort.
It's for the benefit and welfare of all sentient beings.
I've fulfilled my practice and vows and abided in the bodhi tree.
I'm diligent about realizing the true teaching and taking care of it.

source_sentence: 時有魔王領惡軍兵而來障礙。
translation: Then, a demon king with a fierce army came and obstructed them.
He subdued them with the power of a bright dhāraṇī.

source_sentence: 我所思惟往昔魔侶降彼隨喜。
translation: I thought about how my fellow demons from the past had subdued them and followed their lead.
They destroyed their own enemies in the past.
Now, I'll explain the insight to destroy that army of Māra.
The great bright mantra says.

source_sentence: 怛[寧*也]他(引)護嚕護嚕贊拏(引)禮摩(引)鄧詣娑嚩(二合引)賀無能勝菩薩說此明時。
translation: "When the tathāgata (cited) Hulu, Hulu, and Zanna (cited) Salemā (cited) Dundubhisvara, the invincible bodhisattva spoke this incantation.
He transformed himself into the image of a celestial woman.
He stood in front of Māra and gave rise to a compassionate attitude.
He put his palms together, raised his head, and said this.

source_sentence: 菩薩清淨心　　如我說勝義
translation: "The bodhisattva's pure mind is like mine when he explains the ultimate truth.

source_sentence: 大智大光明　　永斷愚癡暗
translation: great wisdom and great illumination permanently eliminates the darkness of folly

source_sentence: 往昔求菩提　　魔軍今已降
translation: "Having sought enlightenment in the past, the army of Māra has now descended.

source_sentence: 降彼魔眾已　　而獲大無畏
translation: Having subdued those Māras, he attains great fearlessness.

source_sentence: 永出於世間　　決定成正覺
translation: permanently emancipated from the world, determined to achieve perfect enlightenment

source_sentence: 為彼天人師　　速疾度群品
translation: to be a teacher of those gods and men and quickly save them all

source_sentence: 汝等一切見　　心生大歡喜
translation: All of you who see... rejoice greatly in your hearts.

source_sentence: 魔王諸眷屬　　無蹈尼連岸
translation: Māra King's retinue: the shore of the untamed niraya

source_sentence: 今以明呪力　　破彼煩惱蓋
translation: Now, with the power of a bright dhāraṇī, I will destroy the hindrances of affliction.
It was then that the unsurpassed bodhisattva.
With the sublime voice of Brahmā, he sounded throughout the ten directions.
He then explained.

source_sentence: After subduing the demon king and his demon retinue.

source_sentence: 理事究竟意願圓滿成大悲師。
translation: He perfected his resolve and accomplished the teacher of great compassion.
At that point, he explained this dhāraṇī.

source_sentence: 令梵天之眾及沙門婆羅門。
translation: It causes the Brahma heavens and ascetics and priests to come together.

source_sentence: 一切世間天人阿修羅眾。
translation: All the world's gods, humans, and asuras.
They'll never see the realm of Māra.
This true teaching also serves as an aid.
It benefits sentient beings, calms disasters, and removes calamities.
It removes numerous poisons and brings well-being.

source_sentence: 若有人非人眾天子天眾及天女眾。
translation: If there are people or non-people, gods, children, gods, and goddesses, then this true teaching will help protect them.

source_sentence: 阿修羅阿修羅眾及阿修羅女眾。
translation: There are all the asuras, all the asuras, and all the asura women.

source_sentence: 乾闥婆乾闥婆眾及乾闥婆女眾。
translation: Gandharvas, gandharvas, and gandharva women.
There are the multitude of fathers, dragons, and nymphs.

source_sentence: 藥叉藥叉眾及藥叉女眾。
translation: Yakṣa, the community of Yakṣa, and the women of Yakṣa.

source_sentence: 羅剎羅剎眾及羅剎女眾。
translation: The Rāṣṭrapāla host and Rāṣṭrapāla women.

source_sentence: 毘舍遮毘舍遮眾及毘舍遮女眾。
translation: Vaiśācī and Vaiśācī women.

source_sentence: 部多部多眾及部多女眾。
translation: The Bhūtā-Bhūtā congregation and the Bhūtā-Women congregation.

source_sentence: 羯吒布單那羯吒布單曩眾及羯吒布單曩女眾。
translation: The Kāṭapūtana Kāṭapūtana congregation and the Kāṭapūtana women.

source_sentence: 車夜車夜眾及車夜女眾。
translation: The Chāyā-Chāyā congregation and the Chāyā women congregation.

source_sentence: 烏麼那烏麼那眾及烏麼那女眾。
translation: The Umana-Umana congregation and the Umana women.

source_sentence: 阿鉢娑麼(二合引)囉阿鉢娑麼(二合引)囉眾及阿鉢娑麼(二合引)囉女眾。
translation: The congregation of Apasama and the women of Apasama.

source_sentence: 烏娑多(二合引)囉烏娑多(二合引)囉眾及烏娑多(二合引)囉女眾。
translation: Ursa Major and Ursa Major were the ladies.

source_sentence: 仡囉(二合)賀仡囉(二合)賀眾及仡囉(二合)賀女眾。
translation: The congregation of GELA and the female congregation of GELA.

source_sentence: 迦軀哩那(二合)迦軀哩那(二合)眾及迦軀哩那(二合)女眾。
translation: There are the Kātyārīna (btn.), the Kātyārīna (btn.) congregation, and the Kātyārīna (btn.) women congregation.
There's also the corpse-rising ghost and the black ghost.

source_sentence: 祖囉拏(二合)瑜虞吠哆尼所(二合)嚩毒藥鬼。
translation: There's the turuṣka demon, the yoginī demon, and the vajra poison demon.
There's the tinea sickness ghost, the leaking sores sickness ghost, and the leprosy sickness ghost.
There's the leprosy ghost, the choking ghost, and the vomiting ghost.
It's a confused ghost, a deluded ghost, and a ghost of delusion.
They're evil-minded and anger-ridden.

source_sentence: 彼等諸鬼所著所魅之時。
translation: When these demons are attached and harbor demons, they can't harm them.

source_sentence: 皆不能為害終不得其便。
translation: They can't do harm, and they'll never get an advantage over them.
Their great luminous power can't be burned by fire.
Water can't drown it, and poison can't harm it.
A sword, stick, bow, and arrow can't harm it.
Vicious thieves and robbers can't be feared.

source_sentence: 橫病不侵命不中夭壽年永遠。
translation: They won't be overcome by rampant disease, and their lives won't be cut short or end up forever.
All sentient beings who see that are docile.

source_sentence: 一切有情見者愛樂名譽遠聞。
translation: All sentient beings who see it are delighted by it, and their reputation is widely known.
Even if they're enemies, they're like brothers.

source_sentence: 如前所說種種利益皆令獲得。
translation: All of the various benefits described above will be obtained.
He then explains.

source_sentence: 曩莫薩哩嚩(二合)沒馱達哩摩(二合)僧契(引)毘藥(二合)悉馱野(二合)哆(引)摩波囉(引)[口*爾]哆(引)尾儞野(二合)摩摩達哩麼(二合引)迦囉細(引)曩寫薩波哩嚩(引)囉寫阿曩囉他(二合引)鉢囉(二合)底嚩(引)哩焰(二合)檐(引)阿哩體(二合)數左散捺哩(二合)設孕(二合)檐(引)娑嚩(二合)悉諦野(三合)娑覩(二合)摩摩達哩麼(二合引)迦囉細(引)曩寫薩波哩嚩(引)囉寫悉馱尾儞野(二合)娑嚩(二合引)賀(引)無能勝大明陀羅尼經
translation: 曩莫薩哩嚩(二合)沒馱達哩摩(二合)僧契(引)毘藥(二合)悉馱野(二合)哆(引)摩波囉(引)[口*爾]哆(引)尾儞野(二合)摩摩達哩麼(二合引)迦囉細(引)曩寫薩波哩嚩(引)囉寫阿曩囉他(二合引)鉢囉(二合)底嚩(引)哩焰(二合)檐(引)阿哩體(二合)數左散捺哩(二合)設孕(二合)檐(引)娑嚩(二合)悉諦野(三合)娑覩(二合)摩摩達哩麼(二合引)迦囉細(引)曩寫薩波哩嚩(引)囉寫悉馱尾儞野(二合)娑嚩(二合引)賀(引)無能勝大明陀羅尼經
